==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|t2=孃|note={{lang|zh|孃}}: “mother”}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|女|良|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
This syllable was not attested in pre-[[Tang]] texts. It may ultimately have been a fusion of {{ltc-l|女郎|lady|id=1,1}} ({{zh-ref|Coblin, 1994: 389}}).

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=niáng
|c=noeng4
|h=pfs=ngiòng
|md=niòng
|mn=qz,xm:liông/zz:liâng/qz,tw,xm:niû/zz:niô͘/qz,tw,xm:niâ
|mn_note=liông/liâng - literary; niû/niô͘/niâ - vernacular
|w=3nyian
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,pn

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[woman]], especially a [[young]] [[girl]]
#: {{zh-x|姑娘{niang}|girl}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[mother]]; [[ma]]
# [[wife]] of another person
# [[elderly]] [[lady]]
# {{lb|zh|religion}} "The [[lady|Lady]]", an [[epithet]] of the [[Fujian]]ese [[sea]] [[goddess]] [[Mazu]] ({{zh-l|媽祖|tr=-}}).
#* '''2016''', "[https://www.mafengwo.cn/poi/6367504.html Penghu Tianhou Temple]", ''Mafengwo'':
#*: [[天后]]宫位于澎湖县马公市正义街上，俗称『[[天妃]]宫』、『[[妈祖]]宫』，在明代称为『'''娘'''宫』、『[[妈娘]]宫』、『[[娘妈]]宫』『[[妈]]宫』等...
